Introduction

Shin Haram, known under her stage name Rami, is a South Korean singer, rapper and dancer under YG Entertainment. She is best known as the main vocalist of the girl group BABYMONSTER with whom she debuted on November 27, 2023 with the group's digital single "Batter Up".
